name: Zelf (DEMO)
description:
Zelf is a quick (and perhaps overly-ambitious) game made for Metrovania Month 19, reminiscent of games like Cave Story and Momodora. In it, you play as Aviva and navigate through a strange cave filled with mushrooms, crystals, and bats!

(The game is in a very early prototype state, and thus the quality is not as high as many would prefer. the game may be buggy, and there will likely be mechanics that feel clunky. please feel free to comment down below if you have any issues!)
